programme.title: The lucky George Bush
programme.short_synopsis: Will George Bush's luck prevail and inspire confidence in the American public in 1991?
programme.medium_synopsis: The unfailing luck of George H W Bush, and the failure of the Democrats to capitalise on the president's poor performance on the economy and hesitance towards domestic issues.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
